00026 include_once ("class_widget.php");
00027 require_once("jrn.php");
00028 
00029 $cn=DbConnect($_SESSION['g_dossier']);
00030 include ('class_user.php');
00031 $User=new cl_user($cn);
00032 $User->Check();
00033 
00034 html_page_start($User->theme, 
00035          "OnLoad=\"SetFocus('e_date',0); AttachEvent(document, 'keydown', HandleSubmit, true);\" ");
00036 
00037 // Check if dossier set
00038 if ( ! isset ( $_SESSION['g_dossier'] ) ) {
00039   echo "You must choose a Dossier ";
00040   exit -2;
00041 }
00042 /* Get the _REQUEST value for p_jrn (jrn_def.jrn_def_id) and jrn_type (jrn_def.jrn_def_code) */
00043 $p_jrn=(isset($_REQUEST['p_jrn']))?$_REQUEST['p_jrn']:-1;
00044 $jrn_type=(isset($_REQUEST['jrn_type']))?$_REQUEST['jrn_type']:-1;
00045 
00046 
00047 echo '<div class="u_tmenu">';
00048 echo ShowMenuCompta($_SESSION['g_dossier']);
00049 echo '</div>';
00050 
00051 if ( $User->admin == 0 ) {
00052   // check if user can access
00053   if (CheckAction($_SESSION['g_dossier'],$_SESSION['g_user'],ENCJRN) == 0 ){
00054     /* Cannot Access */
00055     NoAccess();
00056   }
00057   // if a jrn is asked
00058   if ( $p_jrn != -1 ) {
00059           if (CheckJrn($_SESSION['g_dossier'],$_SESSION['g_user'],$p_jrn) == 0 ){
00060             /* Cannot Access */
00061             NoAccess();
00062             exit -1;
00063           }
00064     } // if isset p_jrn
00065 
00066 }
00067 
00068 // Show the available jrn
00069 $result=ShowJrn("user_jrn.php?jrn_type=".$jrn_type);
00070 echo "<div class=\"u_subtmenu\">";
00071 echo $result;
00072 echo "</div>";
00073 
00074 
00075 
00076 // if a journal is selected show the journal's menu
00077 if ( $p_jrn != -1 ) 
00078 {
00079   // display jrn's menu
00080 
00081   //   echo '</DIV>';
00082   echo '<div class="u_subt2menu">';      
00083   // show the available ledger of the type jrn_type
00084   ShowMenuJrnUser($_SESSION['g_dossier'],$jrn_type,$p_jrn);
00085   echo '</div>';
00086   echo '<div class="lmenu">';      
00087   // show the menu for this journal (Nouveau, voir,...)
00088   $menu_jrn=ShowMenuJrn($cn,$jrn_type, $p_jrn);
00089   echo $menu_jrn;
00090 
00091   echo '</div>';
00092 
00093   $g_dossier=$_SESSION['g_dossier'];
00094   $g_user=$_SESSION['g_user'];
00095       
00096   // Execute Action for p_jrn
00097   if ( $jrn_type=='VEN' )     require('user_action_ven.php');
00098   if ( $jrn_type=='ACH' )     require('user_action_ach.php');
00099   if ( $jrn_type=='FIN' )     require('user_action_fin.php');
00100   if ( $jrn_type=='OD' )     require('user_action_ods.php');
00101   
00102 }
00103 else 
00104 {
00105   if ( $jrn_type=='NONE')
00106     {
00107       include('user_action_gl.php');
00108 
00109     } else {
00110       // no journal are selected so we select the first one
00111       $p_jrn=GetFirstJrnIdForJrnType($_SESSION['g_dossier'],$jrn_type); 
00112       // display jrn's menu
00113       
00114   //   echo '</DIV>';
00115       echo '<div class="u_subt2menu">';      
00116       ShowMenuJrnUser($_SESSION['g_dossier'],$jrn_type,$p_jrn);
00117       echo '</div>';
00118       echo '<div class="lmenu">';      
00119       $menu_jrn=ShowMenuJrn($cn,$jrn_type, $p_jrn);
00120       
00121       echo $menu_jrn;
